import React,{useState}from"react";import{auth}from"./firebase";import{signInWithEmailAndPassword}from"firebase/auth";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Signin(_ref){let{setPage,setUser}=_ref;const[email,setEmail]=useState("");const[password,setPassword]=useState("");const handleSignin=async()=>{try{const userCredential=await signInWithEmailAndPassword(auth,email,password);const userId=userCredential.user.uid;localStorage.setItem("userId",userId);setUser(userId);}catch(error){alert(error.message);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"auth-wrapper d-flex align-items-center justify-content-center",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card auth-card shadow-lg d-flex flex-row",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"tlt auth-left d-flex flex-column justify-content-center align-items-center text-white p-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"",children:"aug"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"",children:"chat with august"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-right p-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"mb-4 text-aut",children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"form-control text-aut",placeholder:"Email address",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"mb-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",className:"form-control text-aut",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"text-aut btn-autumn w-100",onClick:handleSignin,children:"Sign In"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"mt-3 text-muted text-aut",children:["Don\u2019t have an account?"," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-autumn fw-bold",role:"button",onClick:()=>setPage("signup"),children:"Sign Up"})]})]})]})});}export default Signin;
